S.FORM: = France = Gaga kska Owcow ka France, 46 00 N, 2 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 551,500 sq km(hangan na o Tg43)(knlbanga dxgal o 549,970 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 1,530 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 66,836,154 hiyi. Gaga Paris ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 14 idas 7 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal France ga wada sugan 52.70% ka dxgal qpahan, 29.20% ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 18.10% na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Emmanuel Macron, pnaah hngkawas2017 idas 5 jiyax 15pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Nniqan lnlingay Hnyuwan lnlingay kana tndxral qnlhangan 領土地形 Wa mniq Oco ka dxral Hwako u ngalan dha Tndxral Hwako, wa mniq Oco taru tuiril tuiyax 40° dhuq 51°N, 6°W dhuq 10°E, ya bay hntaring 1000 kongri pcbalay tuhunac tudaya tunarac tuiril, so bay rokaku ka hnyuwan tndxral dha, mkmuxultay ka tnkarac dha. Tndxral Hwako tudaya u dhuq Peyhay, tuiril daya u dhuq Ingciri haysya, tuiril u dhuq Tasiyang, tuhunac u dhuq Ticonghay, kiya mi msqapah tndxral tunarac daya ka Pirisu mi Rusnpaw, tunarac ka Doyicu mi Jweysu, tunarac hunac ka Itari mi Moroko, kiya mi tuiril hunac ka Sipanya mi Antawar. Ayus tuhunac mi tunarac Hwako ka dudux tudu dwiyaq pa niqan tudu dwiyaq Pirinyosu, tudu dwiyaq Aarpeysu mi dwiyaq Curo, yayung u niqan yayung Rayin. Mniq kcka Ticonghay u, niqan Kosicyataw mi kari bay mkngahu ucilung cyutaw. Mniq kana nniqan jeynseykay pa kari bay hayway sng mi tndxral nganguc icil ka Hwako, kana tndxral dniyi u singcng cyuhwa mi kwansya pnluban qqlahang pa ini nanaq pntna duma, so niyi ka nniqan dha: Tuhunac Meyco: nHwako Kayyana. Tasiyang: Sngpiyey mi Mikorong mi Aatiryeysu cyutaw ka Kwatiropu, Matingniko, Sngmating mi Sngbasomi. Tapingyang: Hwasu Porinisiya, Sinkoritoniya, Walis mi Hutuna mi Koripotun taw. Intuyang: Ryoniwang, Hwasu Intuyang cutaw, Koroco cyuntaw, Kayarkayrang cyuntaw, SngPoro taw mi Amusutotan taw. Nancico: Atayriti (niqan pnrngawan kari), kcka niya u, msqapah Hwasu Kayyana mi Pasi mi Surinan ka tndxral dha, tndxral Hwasu Sngmating mi Hosu Sngmating u msqapah. Kndkilan karac Spuda Bnkuwan kluwanan karac Kopn, nniqan knbrnux knkana tndxral Hwako pa to bay so nHayyang sing ka kkarac, muxul ka misan mi mtltu ka rbawan, tnkawas u niqan quyux, nniqan bbrnux mi cyoring ka tuhunac, nTiconghaysu ka kkarac, kndnguwan ka rbawan mi qmuyux ka misan. Pdkanan ka kntlxan iidas: Idas 1 tuiril mi tuhunac u ya bay 4－7°C, tunarac mi tudaya u ya bay 1－3°C; idas 7 tudaya mi tuiril u ya bay 16－18°C, tuhunac mi tunarac pa ya bay 21－24°C. Pndkanan ka qsiyaq qnyuxan kngkawas pa 600－800 kongri, lmiqu u dhuq hmrinas 1500 kngri. Bnkuwan kluwan kkarac u so bntasan trahuc niyi: Mkngahu ucilung Hwako pa to bay kkarac mnHayyangsing kana, kiya mi tuiril pa pnrdingan tudaya u Hwarantosusu, dhuq tuhunac Pasuko ka tura bay nniqan mkngahu ucilung; mquri nniqan tuhunac pa alaw weytu kiya ka krinah muxul; mquri tuiril daya daw mtltu balay tuhunac kiya, pndkanan mbiyax ka sbhuran niya. Mquri nniqan ruma u kkarac mnHayyangsing kiya na, binaw psnakan quri nniqan mkngahu ucilung kiya, ngalan dha "Panhayyangsing kkarac" . Mray so mniq Pari mi knkarac nniqan mkrbuq lmiqu u knpriyux balay, krpuhan sisan u ini hari quyux. Nniqan kkarac niyi ka nniqan kkarac mbiyax Hayyangsing mi nniqan kkarac Tarusing kwotu titay. Tukcka mi nniqan tudaya brnux kkarac Hayyangsing mi nniqan mkrbuq Pari ka kkarac Hayyangsi ng mntna knpriyux, so kiya mncun dha splawa "tnkarac Pari" (parisien) Nniqan tudaya mi tunarac pa mquri kkarac Tarusing, rbawan wa kntlxan balay mi ou bay quyux, misan u knskuy bay kndnguwan balay. Nniqan mkngahu ucilung Ticonghay na tuhunac Hwako (Mray so dxral aayu hunac yayung Rona) kkarac mnTiconghay. Ddwiyaq tudu Aarpeysu, ddwiyaq tudu Nyosu, ddwiyaq tudu Hoju, dwiyaq Curo mi nniqan tuckcka brnux baraw u mnlmiqu kkarac. Tndxral quri nganguc Hwako pa to bay mnmtilux kkarac, tnkawas u mtilux bay mi sqquyux balay, Hwasu Kayyana u mtura balay mnJotaysing na Jotayyurin kkarac; kiya mi Sngpiyey mi Mikorong kiya mi Hwasu tuhunac mi tndxral naci ka mnhuciti kkarac, tnkawas knskuy mi kndnguwan. Sngcng cyuhwa Tacyu ka ici singcngcyu Hwako(région), kana qnlhangan pa niqan 18 Tacyu (kiya ka knkana Kosicya singcngcyu), kcka niyi pa niqan 5 ka Hayway tacyu ; cuxan han u niqan 21 ka kana balay tacyu tndxral, kngkawas 2014 mnuda meytaq hyo daw wada pspuwan duma ka tacyu mi mk13 ka tacyu tndxral da. Psuwan ka tacyu pa niqan 101 ka sng dungan , spuda bnkuwan bnatas jiyi muda mku banggo, ddiyun mku banggo yocng (ddiyun mku banggo paya rulu uri). Qnlhangan muda mmurux waya ka Hwako, ana manu bnatas brah way u ini angal pusu biyax kana. Seyji Hwaransi konghoko u muda dmka pnwaya soto ka pmurux waya konghoko, bnsiyaq balay muda pnsltudan mincu. Keyngpo Hwaransi tu5 konghoko pa pnuda meytaq hyo kana kongmin Hwako kngkawas 1958 idas 9 diyax 28 cida, smruwa psdhu dndulan qnlhangan Hwaransi tu5 konghoko. Peyyah cida mnuda smpusal snbarah ka keyngpo, wada bay pkrana pnluban qpringan seyhu mi gikay. Kana singcng cikwan pa niqan dha ka bukung nngalan kari, taxa ka soto konghoko, taxa ka congri. Soto ka bukung yeynso qnlhangan Hwako, niqan biyax phiyu mi malax congri, dmudul kaygi neyko mi pkla biyax waya qnlhangan, kiya mi tubaraw bay nngalan kari butay uri, kndadax kana sediq qnlhangan muda umaw mi phiyu, mnuda mndha seyngkyo, hmrinas dmka sediq dmkuh ka phyuwan soto. Bnkuwan diyax sqpah soto u mn7 kngkawas ka rading han, kngkawas 2000 idas 9 diyax 24 cida, mnuda cweymin kongto ka Hwako mi, babaw na cida daw wada kndadax mn7 kngkawas mi wada mlih mn5 kngkawas ka bnkuwan diyax sqpah soto da, kiya mi malu mndha phyuwan balay ka soto. Soto ka dmudul kaygi neyko, pkla waya qnlhangan; soto ka tubaraw bay bukung turu klwanan butay. Kiya mi, spuda keyngpu tu16 qnay, smturung beyhing bay pnspngan cida, niqan biyax dmuwi beyhing bay biyax psbalay ddaun ka soto, mray so pkla kari mtmay cingci cwangtay ka qnlhangan mi so rmading kana qnlhangan tongyeynring, kiya mi niqan biyax ptalax kokomin gikay uri. Soto saya u Aymannyo Makohong, kiya ka Hwaransi konghoko tu25 pnhyuwan soto, peyyah kngkawas 2017 idas 5 diyax 14 ka pnsdhu. Pusu bay luqi tunux seyhu Hwako ka congri. Kndadax pnspuwan kmnrinas dmka kokomin gikay tangpay (quri so ryeynmong) pnhiyu ka congri, kiya mi soto ka muda psdhu. Spuda tu8 qnay keyngpo Hwako, niqan biyax psdhu duma sediq neyko seyhu ka congri. Spuda tu20, 21 qnay keyngpo, quri so dndulan congri, seyhu ka pusu dmudul mi qmlahang cngco qnlhangan; dmudul kana qqpahun seyhu, pdudul muda waya qnlhangan; seyhu u mquri seykining gikay, kiya mi niqan bay nrunan na quri sbku uuda kaygi gikay. Cuxan han pa soto mi congri u mnuda ini pntna cngtang han, spuda cngtang soto ka hmnrinas dmka kokomin inkay, soto ka muda psdhu congri daw kiya ka mntna cngtang ka congri da, soto ka pusu dmudul qnhlangan, congri ka seykining mku neyko. Aytohwa Huyripu ka wada psdhun congri Hwako Aymannyo Makohong kngkawas 2017 idas 5 diyax 15 cida dhuq saya. Waya qnhlangan Pnwaya waya qnhlangan Hwako pa mnOru Hwasi, kiya ka mndhu bay waya qnlhangan, naqah muda smmalu waya qnlhangan ka hwakwan, wana nanaq malu spuda bntasan qnay waya muda pkla waya qnhlangan ka hwakwan (mniq so duma ringyu ka ou pnklanan suhwa mi muru so ndanan waya qnhlangan cbiyaw). Pusu bay waya qnlhangan Hwako pa muru "Hwako minhwatyeyn". Spuda "Jncweyn syeynyeyn", wana so smliq syakay ka nuda pa kiya ka htranan dha. Waya qnhlangan tisi Hwako pa pnsnakan ddha pusu bay ringyu- suhwa mi konghwa. Tubrah u kiya ka minhwa mi singhwa, tubukuy u kiya ka singcnghwa mi keyngpo. Wana "Kongpaw na seyhu Hwaransi konghoko" ka pnusa patas u kiya ka niqan biyax waya qnhlangan na. Waycyaw Pnrdingan bay kayying pnhiyu ryeynhoko ka Hwako, kiya ka taxa Ryeynhoko anjeyng risuhuy cangjn risuko uri, niqan biyax na murux hyo hmtur. Hwako ka 8 takongyeyko cucu, Sucyey mawyi cucu, Taypingyang kongtongti, Kari Hwaransicyeyn koci cucu mi Intuyang ingkay balay bay ntuman niya, kiya u Cyaropihay qnlhangan ryeynmong ryeynsi ntuman na qnlhangan uri. Pusu bay pnluban ppwaluk kana koci ka Hwako, niqan jeynseykay tudha knbeyhing bay waycyaw wangru kaHwako, knou cuway ciko u msnul Amirika. Hwako ka Cingci hocwo mi pkrana cucu, Ryeynhoko cyawkowen cucu, Koci singcing cucu, Koci turyang hngcyu mi nniqan congpu Kari Hwaransi cweyn koci cucu. Mniq kngkawas 1778 cida muwaya bay qnlhangan tuhuy Amirika cyeyncyaw, kiya mi mniq kngkawas 1964 dungan u muwaya bay tuhuy Cyokoku cyeyncyaw ka sihwang knbeyhing qnlhangan. Tna mniq kngkawas 1547 cida, kiya ka pnhiyu mnwaya bay jeynseykay waycyaw pumen ka Hwako, mniq kngkawas 1589 cida, 4 hiyi kowu tacn Hwako u wada mkseymong hwa ka qpahun, kiya taxa kcka na u waycyaw tacn. Cyunsu Tubaraw bay bukung ucwang riryang Hwako u soto Hwako, kiya pnspuwan Rucyun Hwako, Haycyun Hwako, Kongcyun Hwako mi Keynpey qnhlangan. Kngkawas 2014 cida, kana bay ucwang riryang Hwako u ya bay niqan 22 knbkiyan cangpey heytay, tu24 bnkuwan jeynseykay. Niqan bsiyaq bay rikisi ka knkranan heytay Hwako, quri so rikisi Oco kiya mi knkana rikisi jeynseykay u mnou bay biyax runan niya, 509 oku pila Amirika ka dduwi dha hbangan heytay kngkawas 2015 ka Hwako, GDP dha u 2.3%, tu7 kana jeynseykay. Cangjnrisuko anjeyn risuhuy Ryeynhoko ka Hwako, pnspuwan tosyu cngyeynko Peyyey cucu uri, rngcan cida msupu qnlhangan Peyyey muda kcka qnhlangan mi mquri nganguc qnlhangan ryeynho singtong. Uxay wana Peyyo nanaq, mniq Ahuyrika, Congtong mi Paarkan pantaw ka mtbiyax bay mi muri tumal lnlamu murux uxay daw knou weyho singtong, muda qmpah pusu dmudul knttu uri. Kngkawas 1997 beytaq saya, ini balay uda lmwa mpheytay ka Hwako. Keyjay Spuda GDP mku ka Hwako pa tu7 kana jeynseykay ka knbeyhing cingciti na, quri so biyax dha mari u tu10 kana jeynseykay. Hwako u mnoyeyn mi quri so Omong pskingal sucang ka dhiya, kngkawas 2002, oyeyn ka rmirih hwarang mi wada mpila ddiyun kcka qnlhangan mi seyhu. Kngkawas 2015 qnniqan bay hbangan jeynseykay kcka 500 hangan u, niqan 31 ka ciyey Hwako, spuda bnkuwan matas Sucyey mawyi cucu, kngkawas 2009 cida, Hwako ka kana jeynseykay tu6 knbeyring qnlhangan smalu cngpin cuko mi tu4 qnlhangan cinko. Kngkawas 2008 cida, wada mangal 1,180 oku pila Amirika kasi tocu ka waysang, tu3 bang mntmay qnhlangan Pnsliyan cingci hocwo mi kkranan, msnul Rusnpaw mi Amirika; mntna kngkawas cida Hwako ciyey mquri nganguc tocu u 2,200 oku pila Amirika, tu2 bang mntmay qnhlangan Pnsliyan cingci hocwo mi kkranan, msnul Amirika. Quri so qnbliqan hbangan tnsapah pa, Hwako ka nniqan bay hbangan kana qnlhangan Oco (kiya ka tu4 qnbliqan kana jeynseykay). Niqan mndungus bay qnbliqan dha kndusan ka sediq Hwako, knou bay ka pnyasan dha mi bsiyaq knudus dha uri. Knhbrawan hiyi sediq Kngkawas 2016 idas 1 cida ya bay niqan 6,660 knbkiyan knhbrawan hiyi ka sediq Hwako, nasi ini spuwi ka tndxral nganguc mi nniqan nganguc u ya bay 6,450 knbkiyan hiyi sediq. Tu20 knhbrawan kana jeynseykay ka Hwako, tu3 knhbrawan hiyi sediq kana Oco. Knkrana knhbrawan quri so ikayhwa qnlhangan ka Hwako, so tukubeycu ka qnqhlangan Oco, knkrana putting laqi rabu mi ida nkiya mrana ryu u Hwako ka mrabang niya. Kngkawas 2006 cida mntna bay Omong ka ida nkiya knkrana knhbrawan hiyi sediq, knkawas cida pa ida nkiya knkranan na u 30 knbkiyan hiyi sediq, kiya ka babaw na kngkawas 1973 mnhdu rabu caw u mrabang knkrana, kiya mi pnspuwan kana pntingan rabu ryu pa kndadax kngkawas 1994 cida 1.7 han u wada mkala dhuq 2.0 ka kngkawas 2010 da. Kndadax kngkawas 2006 dhuq kngkawas 2011 ka knkrana ryu kngkawas knhbrawan hiyi sediq Hwako pa 0.6%, pntinga rabu ryu sediq tnhdilan icil ka pusu bay knkranan knhbrawan hiyi sediq, dhuq kngkawas 2010 cida, pntingan laqi rabu 27% ka tndxral Hwako pa qulung niqan taxa tama bubu ka mntuting qnlhangan icil, kiya mi niqan 24% ka tama bubu pntingan laqi rabu u qulung taxa ka uxay mntuting Oco mi mntuting qnlhangan icil. Minjoku Knhbaraw bay pusu rudan cbiyaw sediq Hwako pa sediq Kayarto (sediq Kawru), kiya mi niqan Rating (Roma) mi Juarman (Hwaranko) ka daran dha, splawa dha sediq Hwaransi, hmrinas kana sediq qnlhangan 90% ka knhbrawan hiyi dha. Kcka qnhlangan u niqan minjoku icil, kiya ka knkana sediq Yaarsas, sediq Pasuko, sediq Puryeytani, sediq Tayrongniya, sediq Kosicya, sediq Horayming mi sediq Ositan. Spuda waya qnlhangan Hwako pa, takuymo muda smpu minjoku mi daran ka uuda u sdakar dha kiya. Pnwaya waya qnhlangan niyi u kndadax kngkawas 1789 takoming, mniq keyngpo kngkawas 1958 u wada sdhuwan balay dungan. 20 seyki prading u smturung knhbrawan bay sediq tnhdilan ka Hwako, so niyi ka syakay Hwako u wada kndudul mquri knou kluwanan hwa. Wana iyax kndadax kngkawas 1921 dhuq kngkawas 1935 u, niqan 110 knbkiyan knhbrawan hiyi sediq tnhdilan ka Hwako; mniq 20 seyki 60 kngkwasan cida, mnccbu Aarciriya u wada dmudul ya bay 160 knbkiyan "qaqay qalux" (sediq mnniq Tudaya Ahuyrika lutuc Hwaransi) ka brinah miyah qnhlangan; kiya mi dduma sediq Sipanya, Putawya, Tudaya Ahuyrika mi Tuiril Ahuyrika pa snturung diyax niyi u miyah thdil Hwako uri. Cuku Mongtyeyn yeyncyoso kngkawas 2004 ka mnuda smpu tndxral Hwako u niqan 5,100 knbkiyan ka sediq llutuc Oco (85% knhbrawan hiyi sediq kana qnhlangan), 600 knbkiyan hiyi ka llutuc Tudaya Ahuyrika (10% knhbrawan hiyi sediq kana qnhlangan), 200 knbkiyan ka llutuc Ahuyrika (sediq qalux, 3.3% knhbrawan hiyi sediq kana qnhlangan) mi 100 knbkiyan ka llutuc Asia (1.7% knhbrawan hiyi sediq kana qnhlangan). Kngkawas 2008 cida, Qnhlangan Hwako tongci mi cingci yeyncyoso mi Hwako jnkoswey yeyncyoso ka msupu muda kingal thnganan "Ndanan mi pnyahan" ka tyawca, pkla Hwako u ya bay niqan 500 knbkiyan hiyi sediq ka llutuc Itari, 300 dhuq 600 knbkiyan hiyi sediq ka sediq llutuc Tudaya Ahuyrika, 250 knbkiyan hiyi ka sediq llutuc Ahuyrika (sediq qalux) mi 20 knbkiyan ka sediq llutuc Tuarci. Mniq Hwako, hbaraw hari ka quri sediq llutuc Oco pa to bay sediq Sipanya, sediq Putawya, sediq Romu, sediq Poran, sediq Sira. Kari Spuda keyngpo Hwako tu2 qnay, ddiyun kari seyhu Hwako ka kari Hwaransi, mnRoman tnkari joku, knryuxan pneyyah kari Rating. Kndadax kngkawas 1635 prading, Hwaransi sweysuyeyn u kiya ka pusu biyax knklanan kari hwaransi ciko, binaw uka biyax na phiyu waya. Uxay wana kari Hwaransi, niqan 77 kluwanan kari tnualang ka kcka Hwako, kcka niyi u niqan 8 kluwanan kari u wa psanak nanaq tndxral Hwako, 69 kluwanan kari ka psanak tndxral Hayway. Seyhu Hwako u ini kdakar txtaxa sediq matas patas u dmuwi ana manu kluwan kari mi jiyi, binaw waya qnhlangan Hwako u pusa kari quri mniq sangyey mi nniqan qnpahan u kasi ka dmuwi kari Hwaransi. Mniq qnhlangan u dmudul dmuwi kari Hwaransi, phiyu Kari Hwaransi cweyn koci cucu mi koci ciko uri ka seyhu Hwako, smatang pkrana hnyuwan kari Hwaransi mniq Oco mi knkana jeynseykay. Spuda snpuwan u, ya bay niqan 2.2 oku knhbrawan sediq jeyseykay ka mkla rmngaw kari Hwaransi, kcka niyi u kiya kana ka pusu kari ddiyun dha mi tu2 kari ddiyun dha.

= France = Gaga kska Owcow ka France, 46 00 N, 2 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 551,500 sq km(hangan na o Tg43)(knlbanga dxgal o 549,970 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 1,530 sq km). Kana ka sejiqon o niqan 66,836,154 hiyi. Gaga Paris ka poso alang paro, jiyax 14 idas 7 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Mano ka dxgal France ga wada sogan 52.70% ka dxgal qpahan, 29.20% ka dxgal bboyo, rahoq dxgal do niqan 18.10% na. Bokong klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Emmanoel Macron, pnaah hngkawas2017 idas 5 jiyax 15pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Nniqan lnlingay Hnyowan lnlingay kana tndxral qnlhangan 領土地形 Wa mniq Oco ka dxral Hwako o ngalan dha Tndxral Hwako, wa mniq Oco taro toiril toiyax 40° dhoq 51°N, 6°W dhoq 10°E, ya bay hntaring 1000 kongri pcbalay tohonac todaya tonarac toiril, so bay rokako ka hnyowan tndxral dha, mkmoxoltay ka tnkarac dha. Tndxral Hwako todaya o dhoq Peyhay, toiril daya o dhoq Ingciri haysya, toiril o dhoq Tasiyang, tohonac o dhoq Ticonghay, kiya mi msqapah tndxral tonarac daya ka Piriso mi Rosnpaw, tonarac ka Doyico mi Jweyso, tonarac honac ka Itari mi Moroko, kiya mi toiril honac ka Sipanya mi Antawar. Ayos tohonac mi tonarac Hwako ka dodox todo dwiyaq pa niqan todo dwiyaq Pirinyoso, todo dwiyaq Aarpeyso mi dwiyaq Coro, yayong o niqan yayong Rayin. Mniq kcka Ticonghay o, niqan Kosicyataw mi kari bay mkngaho ocilong cyotaw. Mniq kana nniqan jeynseykay pa kari bay hayway sng mi tndxral ngangoc icil ka Hwako, kana tndxral dniyi o singcng cyohwa mi kwansya pnloban qqlahang pa ini nanaq pntna doma, so niyi ka nniqan dha: Tohonac Meyco: nHwako Kayyana. Tasiyang: Sngpiyey mi Mikorong mi Aatiryeyso cyotaw ka Kwatiropo, Matingniko, Sngmating mi Sngbasomi. Tapingyang: Hwaso Porinisiya, Sinkoritoniya, Walis mi Hotona mi Koripoton taw. Intoyang: Ryoniwang, Hwaso Intoyang cotaw, Koroco cyontaw, Kayarkayrang cyontaw, SngPoro taw mi Amosototan taw. Nancico: Atayriti (niqan pnrngawan kari), kcka niya o, msqapah Hwaso Kayyana mi Pasi mi Sorinan ka tndxral dha, tndxral Hwaso Sngmating mi Hoso Sngmating o msqapah. Kndkilan karac Spoda Bnkowan klowanan karac Kopn, nniqan knbrnox knkana tndxral Hwako pa to bay so nHayyang sing ka kkarac, moxol ka misan mi mtlto ka rbawan, tnkawas o niqan qoyox, nniqan bbrnox mi cyoring ka tohonac, nTiconghayso ka kkarac, kndngowan ka rbawan mi qmoyox ka misan. Pdkanan ka kntlxan iidas: Idas 1 toiril mi tohonac o ya bay 4－7°C, tonarac mi todaya o ya bay 1－3°C; idas 7 todaya mi toiril o ya bay 16－18°C, tohonac mi tonarac pa ya bay 21－24°C. Pndkanan ka qsiyaq qnyoxan kngkawas pa 600－800 kongri, lmiqo o dhoq hmrinas 1500 kngri. Bnkowan klowan kkarac o so bntasan trahoc niyi: Mkngaho ocilong Hwako pa to bay kkarac mnHayyangsing kana, kiya mi toiril pa pnrdingan todaya o Hwarantososo, dhoq tohonac Pasoko ka tora bay nniqan mkngaho ocilong; mqori nniqan tohonac pa alaw weyto kiya ka krinah moxol; mqori toiril daya daw mtlto balay tohonac kiya, pndkanan mbiyax ka sbhoran niya. Mqori nniqan roma o kkarac mnHayyangsing kiya na, binaw psnakan qori nniqan mkngaho ocilong kiya, ngalan dha "Panhayyangsing kkarac" . Mray so mniq Pari mi knkarac nniqan mkrboq lmiqo o knpriyox balay, krpohan sisan o ini hari qoyox. Nniqan kkarac niyi ka nniqan kkarac mbiyax Hayyangsing mi nniqan kkarac Tarosing kwoto titay. Tokcka mi nniqan todaya brnox kkarac Hayyangsing mi nniqan mkrboq Pari ka kkarac Hayyangsi ng mntna knpriyox, so kiya mncon dha splawa "tnkarac Pari" (parisien) Nniqan todaya mi tonarac pa mqori kkarac Tarosing, rbawan wa kntlxan balay mi oo bay qoyox, misan o knskoy bay kndngowan balay. Nniqan mkngaho ocilong Ticonghay na tohonac Hwako (Mray so dxral aayo honac yayong Rona) kkarac mnTiconghay. Ddwiyaq todo Aarpeyso, ddwiyaq todo Nyoso, ddwiyaq todo Hojo, dwiyaq Coro mi nniqan tockcka brnox baraw o mnlmiqo kkarac. Tndxral qori ngangoc Hwako pa to bay mnmtilox kkarac, tnkawas o mtilox bay mi sqqoyox balay, Hwaso Kayyana o mtora balay mnJotaysing na Jotayyorin kkarac; kiya mi Sngpiyey mi Mikorong kiya mi Hwaso tohonac mi tndxral naci ka mnhociti kkarac, tnkawas knskoy mi kndngowan. Sngcng cyohwa Tacyo ka ici singcngcyo Hwako(région), kana qnlhangan pa niqan 18 Tacyo (kiya ka knkana Kosicya singcngcyo), kcka niyi pa niqan 5 ka Hayway tacyo ; coxan han o niqan 21 ka kana balay tacyo tndxral, kngkawas 2014 mnoda meytaq hyo daw wada pspowan doma ka tacyo mi mk13 ka tacyo tndxral da. Psowan ka tacyo pa niqan 101 ka sng dongan , spoda bnkowan bnatas jiyi moda mko banggo, ddiyon mko banggo yocng (ddiyon mko banggo paya rolo ori). Qnlhangan moda mmorox waya ka Hwako, ana mano bnatas brah way o ini angal poso biyax kana. Seyji Hwaransi konghoko o moda dmka pnwaya soto ka pmorox waya konghoko, bnsiyaq balay moda pnsltodan minco. Keyngpo Hwaransi to5 konghoko pa pnoda meytaq hyo kana kongmin Hwako kngkawas 1958 idas 9 diyax 28 cida, smrowa psdho dndolan qnlhangan Hwaransi to5 konghoko. Peyyah cida mnoda smposal snbarah ka keyngpo, wada bay pkrana pnloban qpringan seyho mi gikay. Kana singcng cikwan pa niqan dha ka bokong nngalan kari, taxa ka soto konghoko, taxa ka congri. Soto ka bokong yeynso qnlhangan Hwako, niqan biyax phiyo mi malax congri, dmodol kaygi neyko mi pkla biyax waya qnlhangan, kiya mi tobaraw bay nngalan kari botay ori, kndadax kana sediq qnlhangan moda omaw mi phiyo, mnoda mndha seyngkyo, hmrinas dmka sediq dmkoh ka phyowan soto. Bnkowan diyax sqpah soto o mn7 kngkawas ka rading han, kngkawas 2000 idas 9 diyax 24 cida, mnoda cweymin kongto ka Hwako mi, babaw na cida daw wada kndadax mn7 kngkawas mi wada mlih mn5 kngkawas ka bnkowan diyax sqpah soto da, kiya mi malo mndha phyowan balay ka soto. Soto ka dmodol kaygi neyko, pkla waya qnlhangan; soto ka tobaraw bay bokong toro klwanan botay. Kiya mi, spoda keyngpo to16 qnay, smtorong beyhing bay pnspngan cida, niqan biyax dmowi beyhing bay biyax psbalay ddaon ka soto, mray so pkla kari mtmay cingci cwangtay ka qnlhangan mi so rmading kana qnlhangan tongyeynring, kiya mi niqan biyax ptalax kokomin gikay ori. Soto saya o Aymannyo Makohong, kiya ka Hwaransi konghoko to25 pnhyowan soto, peyyah kngkawas 2017 idas 5 diyax 14 ka pnsdho. Poso bay loqi tonox seyho Hwako ka congri. Kndadax pnspowan kmnrinas dmka kokomin gikay tangpay (qori so ryeynmong) pnhiyo ka congri, kiya mi soto ka moda psdho. Spoda to8 qnay keyngpo Hwako, niqan biyax psdho doma sediq neyko seyho ka congri. Spoda to20, 21 qnay keyngpo, qori so dndolan congri, seyho ka poso dmodol mi qmlahang cngco qnlhangan; dmodol kana qqpahon seyho, pdodol moda waya qnlhangan; seyho o mqori seykining gikay, kiya mi niqan bay nronan na qori sbko ooda kaygi gikay. Coxan han pa soto mi congri o mnoda ini pntna cngtang han, spoda cngtang soto ka hmnrinas dmka kokomin inkay, soto ka moda psdho congri daw kiya ka mntna cngtang ka congri da, soto ka poso dmodol qnhlangan, congri ka seykining mko neyko. Aytohwa Hoyripo ka wada psdhon congri Hwako Aymannyo Makohong kngkawas 2017 idas 5 diyax 15 cida dhoq saya. Waya qnhlangan Pnwaya waya qnhlangan Hwako pa mnOro Hwasi, kiya ka mndho bay waya qnlhangan, naqah moda smmalo waya qnlhangan ka hwakwan, wana nanaq malo spoda bntasan qnay waya moda pkla waya qnhlangan ka hwakwan (mniq so doma ringyo ka oo pnklanan sohwa mi moro so ndanan waya qnhlangan cbiyaw). Poso bay waya qnlhangan Hwako pa moro "Hwako minhwatyeyn". Spoda "Jncweyn syeynyeyn", wana so smliq syakay ka noda pa kiya ka htranan dha. Waya qnhlangan tisi Hwako pa pnsnakan ddha poso bay ringyo- sohwa mi konghwa. Tobrah o kiya ka minhwa mi singhwa, tobokoy o kiya ka singcnghwa mi keyngpo. Wana "Kongpaw na seyho Hwaransi konghoko" ka pnosa patas o kiya ka niqan biyax waya qnhlangan na. Waycyaw Pnrdingan bay kayying pnhiyo ryeynhoko ka Hwako, kiya ka taxa Ryeynhoko anjeyng risohoy cangjn risoko ori, niqan biyax na morox hyo hmtor. Hwako ka 8 takongyeyko coco, Socyey mawyi coco, Taypingyang kongtongti, Kari Hwaransicyeyn koci coco mi Intoyang ingkay balay bay ntoman niya, kiya o Cyaropihay qnlhangan ryeynmong ryeynsi ntoman na qnlhangan ori. Poso bay pnloban ppwalok kana koci ka Hwako, niqan jeynseykay todha knbeyhing bay waycyaw wangro kaHwako, knoo coway ciko o msnol Amirika. Hwako ka Cingci hocwo mi pkrana coco, Ryeynhoko cyawkowen coco, Koci singcing coco, Koci toryang hngcyo mi nniqan congpo Kari Hwaransi cweyn koci coco. Mniq kngkawas 1778 cida mowaya bay qnlhangan tohoy Amirika cyeyncyaw, kiya mi mniq kngkawas 1964 dongan o mowaya bay tohoy Cyokoko cyeyncyaw ka sihwang knbeyhing qnlhangan. Tna mniq kngkawas 1547 cida, kiya ka pnhiyo mnwaya bay jeynseykay waycyaw pomen ka Hwako, mniq kngkawas 1589 cida, 4 hiyi kowo tacn Hwako o wada mkseymong hwa ka qpahon, kiya taxa kcka na o waycyaw tacn. Cyonso Tobaraw bay bokong ocwang riryang Hwako o soto Hwako, kiya pnspowan Rocyon Hwako, Haycyon Hwako, Kongcyon Hwako mi Keynpey qnhlangan. Kngkawas 2014 cida, kana bay ocwang riryang Hwako o ya bay niqan 22 knbkiyan cangpey heytay, to24 bnkowan jeynseykay. Niqan bsiyaq bay rikisi ka knkranan heytay Hwako, qori so rikisi Oco kiya mi knkana rikisi jeynseykay o mnoo bay biyax ronan niya, 509 oko pila Amirika ka ddowi dha hbangan heytay kngkawas 2015 ka Hwako, GDP dha o 2.3%, to7 kana jeynseykay. Cangjnrisoko anjeyn risohoy Ryeynhoko ka Hwako, pnspowan tosyo cngyeynko Peyyey coco ori, rngcan cida msopo qnlhangan Peyyey moda kcka qnhlangan mi mqori ngangoc qnlhangan ryeynho singtong. Uxay wana Peyyo nanaq, mniq Ahoyrika, Congtong mi Paarkan pantaw ka mtbiyax bay mi mori tomal lnlamo morox oxay daw knoo weyho singtong, moda qmpah poso dmodol kntto ori. Kngkawas 1997 beytaq saya, ini balay oda lmwa mpheytay ka Hwako. Keyjay Spoda GDP mko ka Hwako pa to7 kana jeynseykay ka knbeyhing cingciti na, qori so biyax dha mari o to10 kana jeynseykay. Hwako o mnoyeyn mi qori so Omong pskingal socang ka dhiya, kngkawas 2002, oyeyn ka rmirih hwarang mi wada mpila ddiyon kcka qnlhangan mi seyho. Kngkawas 2015 qnniqan bay hbangan jeynseykay kcka 500 hangan o, niqan 31 ka ciyey Hwako, spoda bnkowan matas Socyey mawyi coco, kngkawas 2009 cida, Hwako ka kana jeynseykay to6 knbeyring qnlhangan smalo cngpin coko mi to4 qnlhangan cinko. Kngkawas 2008 cida, wada mangal 1,180 oko pila Amirika kasi toco ka waysang, to3 bang mntmay qnhlangan Pnsliyan cingci hocwo mi kkranan, msnol Rosnpaw mi Amirika; mntna kngkawas cida Hwako ciyey mqori ngangoc toco o 2,200 oko pila Amirika, to2 bang mntmay qnhlangan Pnsliyan cingci hocwo mi kkranan, msnol Amirika. Qori so qnbliqan hbangan tnsapah pa, Hwako ka nniqan bay hbangan kana qnlhangan Oco (kiya ka to4 qnbliqan kana jeynseykay). Niqan mndongos bay qnbliqan dha kndosan ka sediq Hwako, knoo bay ka pnyasan dha mi bsiyaq knodos dha ori. Knhbrawan hiyi sediq Kngkawas 2016 idas 1 cida ya bay niqan 6,660 knbkiyan knhbrawan hiyi ka sediq Hwako, nasi ini spowi ka tndxral ngangoc mi nniqan ngangoc o ya bay 6,450 knbkiyan hiyi sediq. To20 knhbrawan kana jeynseykay ka Hwako, to3 knhbrawan hiyi sediq kana Oco. Knkrana knhbrawan qori so ikayhwa qnlhangan ka Hwako, so tokobeyco ka qnqhlangan Oco, knkrana potting laqi rabo mi ida nkiya mrana ryo o Hwako ka mrabang niya. Kngkawas 2006 cida mntna bay Omong ka ida nkiya knkrana knhbrawan hiyi sediq, knkawas cida pa ida nkiya knkranan na o 30 knbkiyan hiyi sediq, kiya ka babaw na kngkawas 1973 mnhdo rabo caw o mrabang knkrana, kiya mi pnspowan kana pntingan rabo ryo pa kndadax kngkawas 1994 cida 1.7 han o wada mkala dhoq 2.0 ka kngkawas 2010 da. Kndadax kngkawas 2006 dhoq kngkawas 2011 ka knkrana ryo kngkawas knhbrawan hiyi sediq Hwako pa 0.6%, pntinga rabo ryo sediq tnhdilan icil ka poso bay knkranan knhbrawan hiyi sediq, dhoq kngkawas 2010 cida, pntingan laqi rabo 27% ka tndxral Hwako pa qolong niqan taxa tama bobo ka mntoting qnlhangan icil, kiya mi niqan 24% ka tama bobo pntingan laqi rabo o qolong taxa ka oxay mntoting Oco mi mntoting qnlhangan icil. Minjoko Knhbaraw bay poso rodan cbiyaw sediq Hwako pa sediq Kayarto (sediq Kawro), kiya mi niqan Rating (Roma) mi Joarman (Hwaranko) ka daran dha, splawa dha sediq Hwaransi, hmrinas kana sediq qnlhangan 90% ka knhbrawan hiyi dha. Kcka qnhlangan o niqan minjoko icil, kiya ka knkana sediq Yaarsas, sediq Pasoko, sediq Poryeytani, sediq Tayrongniya, sediq Kosicya, sediq Horayming mi sediq Ositan. Spoda waya qnlhangan Hwako pa, takoymo moda smpo minjoko mi daran ka ooda o sdakar dha kiya. Pnwaya waya qnhlangan niyi o kndadax kngkawas 1789 takoming, mniq keyngpo kngkawas 1958 o wada sdhowan balay dongan. 20 seyki prading o smtorong knhbrawan bay sediq tnhdilan ka Hwako, so niyi ka syakay Hwako o wada kndodol mqori knoo klowanan hwa. Wana iyax kndadax kngkawas 1921 dhoq kngkawas 1935 o, niqan 110 knbkiyan knhbrawan hiyi sediq tnhdilan ka Hwako; mniq 20 seyki 60 kngkwasan cida, mnccbo Aarciriya o wada dmodol ya bay 160 knbkiyan "qaqay qalox" (sediq mnniq Todaya Ahoyrika lotoc Hwaransi) ka brinah miyah qnhlangan; kiya mi ddoma sediq Sipanya, Potawya, Todaya Ahoyrika mi Toiril Ahoyrika pa sntorong diyax niyi o miyah thdil Hwako ori. Coko Mongtyeyn yeyncyoso kngkawas 2004 ka mnoda smpo tndxral Hwako o niqan 5,100 knbkiyan ka sediq llotoc Oco (85% knhbrawan hiyi sediq kana qnhlangan), 600 knbkiyan hiyi ka llotoc Todaya Ahoyrika (10% knhbrawan hiyi sediq kana qnhlangan), 200 knbkiyan ka llotoc Ahoyrika (sediq qalox, 3.3% knhbrawan hiyi sediq kana qnhlangan) mi 100 knbkiyan ka llotoc Asia (1.7% knhbrawan hiyi sediq kana qnhlangan). Kngkawas 2008 cida, Qnhlangan Hwako tongci mi cingci yeyncyoso mi Hwako jnkoswey yeyncyoso ka msopo moda kingal thnganan "Ndanan mi pnyahan" ka tyawca, pkla Hwako o ya bay niqan 500 knbkiyan hiyi sediq ka llotoc Itari, 300 dhoq 600 knbkiyan hiyi sediq ka sediq llotoc Todaya Ahoyrika, 250 knbkiyan hiyi ka sediq llotoc Ahoyrika (sediq qalox) mi 20 knbkiyan ka sediq llotoc Toarci. Mniq Hwako, hbaraw hari ka qori sediq llotoc Oco pa to bay sediq Sipanya, sediq Potawya, sediq Romo, sediq Poran, sediq Sira. Kari Spoda keyngpo Hwako to2 qnay, ddiyon kari seyho Hwako ka kari Hwaransi, mnRoman tnkari joko, knryoxan pneyyah kari Rating. Kndadax kngkawas 1635 prading, Hwaransi sweysoyeyn o kiya ka poso biyax knklanan kari hwaransi ciko, binaw oka biyax na phiyo waya. Uxay wana kari Hwaransi, niqan 77 klowanan kari tnoalang ka kcka Hwako, kcka niyi o niqan 8 klowanan kari o wa psanak nanaq tndxral Hwako, 69 klowanan kari ka psanak tndxral Hayway. Seyho Hwako o ini kdakar txtaxa sediq matas patas o dmowi ana mano klowan kari mi jiyi, binaw waya qnhlangan Hwako o posa kari qori mniq sangyey mi nniqan qnpahan o kasi ka dmowi kari Hwaransi. Mniq qnhlangan o dmodol dmowi kari Hwaransi, phiyo Kari Hwaransi cweyn koci coco mi koci ciko ori ka seyho Hwako, smatang pkrana hnyowan kari Hwaransi mniq Oco mi knkana jeynseykay. Spoda snpowan o, ya bay niqan 2.2 oko knhbrawan sediq jeyseykay ka mkla rmngaw kari Hwaransi, kcka niyi o kiya kana ka poso kari ddiyon dha mi to2 kari ddiyon dha.
